data.name: Type.Required
data.value: The type name for the science record is required.

data.name: labelIsSystem.Help
data.value: System science record types have special meaning for the system work, therefore they cannot be deleted and modification of the key field values is limited.

data.name: labelDescriptionIsRequired.Help
data.value: Check to make description of science record of this type required.

data.name: labelNumOfValues.Help
data.value: Enter the number of numeric values (from 0 to 2) accociated with a science record of this type.

data.name: NumOfValues.Required
data.value: The number of values is required.

data.name: NumOfValues.Invalid
data.value: The number of values must be an integer number from 0 to 2.

data.name: labelSortIndex.Help
data.value: Enter an integer number which will be used in the sorting of science records of this type.

data.name: SortIndex.Invalid
data.value: Sort index must be an integer.
